name: Chatterly
problem: Most social platforms struggle to synchronize messaging, stories, feed updates, and notifications in real-time, causing delays and inconsistent user experience.
solution: Built a full-featured real-time social media platform with instant messaging, Instagram-style stories, social feed, friend system, and a unified WebSocket event architecture powering notifications, online presence, and live updates.
impact: Delivered a seamless real-time experience across messaging, feed activities, stories, and notifications. Achieved sub-second synchronization for posts, likes, comments, messages, and friend requests, showcasing mastery in scalable real-time systems.
features: Real-time messaging with typing indicators, read receipts, and instant delivery
Instagram-style stories with media uploads and time-based visibility
Social feed with live updates for posts, likes, and comments
Full friend system with requests, acceptance, discovery, and suggestions
Real-time notification system for posts, comments, likes, messages, and requests
Online presence indicators for all users across messaging and feed
Media sharing across posts, stories, and chat with compression via Cloudinary
Toast and push-style alerts for all real-time events
keyAchievements: Architected a multi-channel WebSocket system handling messaging, notifications, feed updates, and online status concurrently
Implemented modular Express.js MVC server architecture for scalable real-time features
Integrated Cloudinary media pipeline with 60% file size reduction while retaining quality
Designed highly interactive UX flows across chat, feed, and stories inspired by top social apps
challenges: Synchronizing diverse real-time events (messages, posts, likes, comments, friend requests) without performance loss
Managing concurrent WebSocket connections with proper error recovery and reconnection logic
Optimizing media uploads and previews across stories, posts, and chat
Ensuring accurate presence tracking and live feed updates under high concurrency

name: BlogWave
problem: Writers often lack a distraction-free platform with community-focused engagement.
solution: Developed a minimalist full-stack blogging platform enabling rich text publishing, personalized feeds, and smooth CRUD operations.
impact: Delivered an end-to-end content management system with Redux state management and responsive design, showcasing complete MERN stack proficiency.
features: Rich text editor with formatting tools (bold, italic, lists)
keyAchievements: Integrated rich text editor with custom formatting controls for enhanced content creation
Implemented Redux Toolkit for centralized state management across the application
Designed clean, professional UI/UX with focus on readability and user experience
Built scalable REST API with Express and MongoDB for efficient data handling
challenges: Overcame Redux learning curve by mastering slices, thunks, and global state patterns
Refined UI design through multiple iterations to achieve a professional aesthetic
Implemented follow/unfollow and blog-like systems for the first time, enhancing user engagement
